notes.text:
An update is available for libdrm, libglvnd, mesa.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RLBA-2022:1855

document.title: mesa and related packages bug fix and enhancement update
